summary: An introverted garbageman writes his thoughts in a notebook after Henry Fool, writer and ex-con, rents the basement and gives him a notebook and the idea. He writes poetry and Henry helps him along.
cast: Thomas Jay Ryan|James Urbaniak|Parker Posey|Maria Porter|James Saito|Kevin Corrigan|Liam Aiken|Miho Nikaido|Gene Ruffini|Nicholas Hope|Diana Ruppe|Veanne Cox|Jan Leslie Harding|Chaylee Worrall|Christy Carlson Romano|Chuck Montgomery|Melanie Vesey|Denise Morgan|Jill Morley|Paul Boocock|David Latham|Marissa Chibas|Julie Anderson|Reggie Harris|Don Creech|Camille Paglia|Maraya Chase|Shoshana Ami|Karen DiConcetto|Tiffany Sampson|Rachel Miner|Paul Lazar|Gretchen Krich|Valorie Hubbard|Dave Simonds|Fay Ann Lee|Paul Greco|Blake Willett|Raymond Cassar|Katreen Hardt|Rebecca Nelson|Paul Albe|Vivian Bang|Brandon Boey|Claire Ritchie|Herbie Duarte|Toy Connor
title: Henry Fool
